title: [PSP] Patapon 2 (US).rar
description:
FILE INFORMATION:
Type: rar/cso
Size: 320,251/364,825 kb
Region: US
Description: Full Patapon 2 game rip (PSN version)
Tracker: Demonoid

NOTES
***Demonoid rocks.
***This is a CSO file, not an ISO.  CSO files are usually much
   more compressed.  This particular file was compressed on
   setting level 9 (highest) using danny_kay1710's PSP ISO
   Compressor v1.4.  
***This is the US version of Patapon 2.  Only US saved games
   are compatible with this version.
***You will need custom firmware (CFW) to run this.  I
   recommend that you use 5.00 m33-6.
***I have only tested this file on 5.00 m33-6 and it worked
   flawlessly.
***By using this file you are agreeing that you have purchased
   and own a legal copy of Patapon 2 for the PSP.  I hold no
   accountability for any crimes that you may be committing.
***PLEASE SEED!!!

PROCEDURE
1) Connect your PSP to your computer via a USB connection.
2) Go to "My Computer."
3) Open your PSP's drive.
4) Create/Open the folder named "ISO."
5) Drag and Drop "Patapon 2.cso" into that folder.

PLEASE SEED
Please seed this torrent until your ratio is at least 1.00
(meaning that you have uploaded just as much as you have
downloaded).  Thank you.
